Posts.Content: You can read about other patients who have received TomoTherapy at their patient profile section on website: http://www.tomotherapy.com/patient/profiles/pt_agildner/%22 Also the three60 online magazine on their homepage has a story about breast cancer survivor Pam, who also underwent Tomotherapy: www.tomotherapy.com  All the best for successful treatment
Posts.Title: Treatment for metastatic breast cancer, now in the brain
